meanings.definition: A meeting or encounter, especially a sudden or unexpected one.
meanings.sent1: During the rencounter at the park, they exchanged surprised greetings.
meanings.sent2: The rencounter with a long-lost friend brought tears of joy.
meanings.sent3: The rencounter with a squirrel in the attic was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The rencounter with reality was a harsh wake-up call.
meanings.sent5: The rencounter with the mysterious figure left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: To meet or encounter unexpectedly or by chance.
meanings.sent1: She rencountered her childhood toy while cleaning the attic.
meanings.sent2: They rencountered each other at the grocery store after years.
meanings.sent3: The cat rencountered the laser pointer and went on a playful chase.
meanings.sent4: He rencountered his fear of heights when climbing the ladder.
meanings.sent5: The detective rencountered the suspect at the crime scene.
